Package nl.pim16aap2.armoredElytra.handlers

Class AbstractSmithingTableListener

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.armoredElytra.handlers.AbstractSmithingTableListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
public abstract class AbstractSmithingTableListener extends Object implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Abstract class for handling SmithingTable events.

New instances of this class should be created using the create(Semver, ArmoredElytra, NBTEditor, DurabilityManager, ConfigLoader) method.

    • onSmithingTableUsage0

      protected ElytraInput onSmithingTableUsage0(org.bukkit.event.inventory.PrepareSmithingEvent event)
      Handles the usage of the SmithingTable.
      Parameters:
      event - The PrepareSmithingEvent to handle.
      Returns:
      The ElytraInput that was used to handle the event.

    • onSmithingInventoryResultClick

      protected final void onSmithingInventoryResultClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.SmithingInventory smithingInventory)
      Processes the InventoryClickEvent when the player clicks on the result slot in a smithing table.

      This method will check if the result is an armored elytra, and if so, give it to the player.

      Parameters:
      event - The InventoryClickEvent to process.
      player - The Player who clicked on the result slot.
      smithingInventory - The SmithingInventory which was clicked.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the clicked slot is not the result slot.

    • isRecipeResultPlaceholder

      protected boolean isRecipeResultPlaceholder(@Nullable org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
      Checks if the given ItemStack is a placeholder for a recipe result.

      Implementations that do not use a placeholder result do not need to override this method.

      Parameters:
      result - The ItemStack to check.
      Returns:
      true if the given ItemStack is a placeholder for a recipe result, false otherwise.

    • useItem

      protected void useItem(org.bukkit.inventory.SmithingInventory smithingInventory, int slot)
      Consumes a single item from the given slot in the given SmithingInventory.
      Parameters:
      smithingInventory - The SmithingInventory to consume the item from.
      slot - The slot to consume the item from.

    • giveItemToPlayer

      @CheckReturnValue protected boolean giveItemToPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, boolean direct)
      Attempts to move an item to a player's inventory.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to give the item to.
      item - The item to give.
      direct - Whether to put it in the player's inventory. When set to false it will be put in their cursor instead.
      Returns:
      True if the item could be given to the player, otherwise false (e.g. when their inventory is full).
